properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 8 at 7:24PM CST until February 13 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* from Monday February 10 until Wednesday February 12.
* At 6 PM Saturday the stage was 15.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Maximum forecast stage of 18.0 feet on Tuesday February 11.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Wednesday February 5 and will
continue rising to near 18.0 feet by Tuesday February 11. The river
will may fall below flood stage Wednesday February 12.
* At 18.0 feet...Water is flowing over Hood Road. The flood plain
between Town Creek and the Tombigbee River is flooded.  Extensive
agricultural flooding is occurring along Highway 6 near Bigbee.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
